Header.Name: Commport
Header.Subject: Complete the Commport Questionnaire
Header.Suggestion: Send an email to the project analyst stating that the customer needs to complete the Commport Questionnaire.

ScribTemplate.Template: Hi [$:CONSULTANT_NAME],[$$:BR][$$:BR]The customers “[$:CUSTOMER_NAME]” needs to complete the Commport Questionnaire. [$$:BR][$$:BR]For reference: the trading partner is [$:PARTNER_NAME]. [$$:BR][$$:BR]Best Regards,[$$:BR][$:USER_NAME]
